column3: DISTRIBUTION OF  GRANTED PATENTS WITH RESPECT TO CITIES

column1: * Statistical datas of 2016 have been prepared by the reporting date of 17.01.2017.
* Register information of the first applicant have been considered  by the reporting  date of 17.01.2017.
* Applications rejected and applications out of transaction have been included in  the application datas in the course of first application.
* Registration datas have been prepared in deference to  the registration date.
